content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i and a friend were standing outside of our recording studio after a jam session and we noticed a bright star below the big dipper. we looked at it a about 30-seconds and then it just vanished into thin air.

about five minutes later, a star-like glowing object traveling south-east went right above our heads and then made an abrupt right turn, changing direction now going south.  the object then passed between two stars and when it did, the object and the two stars disappeared. right before it disappeared, it ejected something out the back.  i was filming at this point and caught the object on video (clip provided).

not more than three minutes later, we observed the same type of object in the sky west of us and it traveled north for about five seconds and then disappeared into thin air.  this one i did not get on film.

my friend that was with us is a scientist and an astronomer and he said that is was not a satellite or the i.S.S., but indeed was something unexplainable.
content.summary: I was standing outside of our recording studio when all of a sudden a glowing object appeared out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside making a video of the moon.  the previous night i made one and the moon was pulsating with a mechanical sound, i wanted to see if it would happen twice. it pulsated briefly but not as before.  similar to the night before i saw a very bright star that was moving this time from east to northwest, i tried to capture it on video but it went in the direction of the moon and disappeared. so started taking pictures, when i looked into the camera while holding down the button i saw a small bright object to the left of the moon i snapped several pictures.  the object appeared only in the first, it appeared as though it was moving. i'll attach a photo of the object in img 0079, the following photo  img 0080 doesn't show the object. i don't know what happened to the object.  i felt o.K because i have seen these things before.  i had a very close sighting with a large object a few years ago that shook me up. this object was very low very large, looked like something out of startreck movie, but now i'm not scared anymore. i realize that they somehow connect to thought, whenever i think about them i usually see them shortly. and i have had contacts with different types of beings, mostly while asleep.I've gotten over the fear so now i'm able to mention it.
content.summary: I saw a glowing object going towards the moon looking like a ball of light

content.detailedDescription: i was sitting on my porch late evening and saw this object coming from the east toward  our direction. the closer it got to us the bigger it got looked like a light  coming in a straight line across the sky. it got to certain spot and stopped had a red glowing appearance for about a couple mins. then dissapeared.
content.summary: Look like a glowing object comeing across the sky and stop ped and hoovered

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on new guinea road. turned left after target to head over bridge.  to my left, over the target or vre train station, noticed something hovering stationary in the air, maybe a few hundred feet up. now that i think about it, there is an electricity transformer station there as well and the object could have been hovering over that.  both son and i saw it and neither of us could really tell what the object was. maybe about the size of a large car, kind of disc shaped --- imagine a dark grey balloon that's semi deflated just floating there.  but it wasn't a balloon because it didn't move at all that we saw. we even pulled over to look at it. it did not move, had no real shape to it. it had no lights on it that we could tell. my phone didn't have enough battery power to take a picture, which is really unfortunate.

i took my son to his friend's house, drove home the same way to see it again but it wasn't there.  however, there was some other kind of helicopter or aircraft in the vicinity with two very bright lights slowly blinking on and off.  i have no idea if this was related.

also, not sure if it's related, but the street lights on a lot of the roads in the area were out.  the stop lights were working but the street lights were out all the way down to the beltway.
content.summary: Formless shape hovering in burke, va

content.detailedDescription:
On the morning of the 23 june 2013 i was on my front porch that faces east.
the time was around 7:45 am. mst. i noticed in the sky to the east a short vapor trail that looked like a typical trail except it was all by itself in the sky and was squared off at both ends. it was about 7 or 8 times as long as it was wide.  i got curious and went and got a pair of 10x50 binoculars.  i looked at the trail and noted a bronze colored sphere at the south end in the clear part of the sky.  the sphere's angle changed and it appeared somewhat oval. it appeared to have been going in a southerly direction and was responsible for the contrail. the object was stationary when i saw it however. then it changed direction did a 180 deg. turn and went back into the contrail. since the contrail was alone in the sky and short in length, i expected the object to emerge from the other side. i observed the contrail for a number of minutes, 7:48-8:05 am mst.
the object never reappeared.  i checked at various distances from the contrail but saw nothing but blue sky. the object had gone back into the contrail and did not come out. slowly the contrail lengthened due to upper atmosphere winds and still no sign of the object. whatever it was it was not an airplane nor a weather balloon. no airplane etc. was involved in this event in any way. to put it another way the contrail 
"swallowed up" the object as the object never reappeared after going into the contrail. there was clear blue sky all around the contrail and object at the time of the sighting.

i would request that the investigator who worked on case ##47275 do a follow up on this event as well.
content.summary: Unknown aerial object flew into a following vapor train in othereise empty sky and never reappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Dear friends,

ufo and aliens i don't know, one year back i'm alone travel on my bike from hyderabad to my village start to midnight oo:30 am i'm alone, because i was seen one of the big shape on sky (ring with lights) 3 or 4 times in long lent seeing shape, but i'm scared that one.
content.summary: I saw one shade on the sky

content.detailedDescription: Four fire like sphere's between wrenwood and fox roads on 6-22-13. around8:30 pm.They glowed like yellow fire. one looked like it had a red object going around it. one came to a complete stop, then took off super fast. i also have to say these ufo's were dead silent. my wife and son also witnessed this sighting.
content.summary: Four fire like sphere's in sky like they were looking for something.

content.detailedDescription: 6/23/12 @ 9:34 to 9:48 pm.  i was watching the ocean tide come in and checking out the full moon and stars.  i felt an urgent sense of fear like someone was standing behind me and as i turned around i viewed a "bright orange fireball" over the ne section of oxnard, ca. it first appeared at about 500-600 feet obove the ground in the direction of the oxnard airport approx. 2.5 miles nne from my sight location which was about 200 feet north of the "west channel islands blvd" at the waterline on the beach.   object had visible orange flames with slightly yellowish tips on top in a ball formation approx. 10-20 feet in diameter and was slowing ascending 50-100 feet per minute in a southerly direction.  there was no noise such as a jet or other aircraft.  after approx. 2.5 minutes the object changed direction and began decending at a slightly faster rate, 150 fpm, and heading more westerly towards my sight location and was getting brighter.  at the 3.5 minute mark, the object began a slow radical movement up and down and back and forth and then began to rise up quickly from 300-2000 fpm and was last observed heading in a northeasterly direction and then finally was out of sight at about the 4.5 minute mark at an altitdue of approx. 3,000-4,000 ft.  times were checked with my cell phone.  i took 2 videos, but cell phone quality is extremely poor.  at the very beginning of the first video, mov071, it shows the fireballs proximety to a local beach resort hotel.  the white light on the left is a small private aircraft and the faint red light in the middle of the screen above the lights on the hotel roof is the fireball.  the second video, mov072, faintly shows the fireball burning as it is decending.  my phone stopped recording after a few seconds.
content.summary: Fireball suddenly appeared and decended slowly south, hovered, then returned northeasterly and ascended very quickly out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting a friend's house across the street from my house. informing her about the existence of aliens. prior to watching some science documentaries on television. after 5 minutes she faced her back towards me and i looked blanked in the beautiful clear starry sky and unknowingly just couldn't help but notice something star like fall but flashed a bright galactic radiant neon green and instantly disappeared with a metallic purple outlining it's gorgeous appearance. i suddenly turned and looked at my friend with an unbelievable jaw dropping reaction hoping she had witnessed what i did and she didn't. it being the 1st time in my existence to have had witnessed something so vast and lucid within a duration of instant seconds. shortly right after what i saw, tiny anxiety developed prior to seeing what i saw. in an unbelievable distraught, for the reason of being the only witness to what i experienced. 
personally i thought i saw a shooting star profoundly but it seemed too close and radiantly bright to have appeared far in the starry sky.
content.summary: Star like mystery???

content.detailedDescription: Was heading to work on or about july 2002 on route 99 near the entrance to the nrv speedway, and i just happened to look up and about 1 o'clock high was a "aircraft" that was shaped roughly like a old child's top in battleship grey color. the next day on the same route i happened to look up and i saw a "aircraft" shaped like a warp nacell off a star trek nx class starship (cylindrical). a couple of days after the encounter i'd seen a squadron of blackhawks in this formation > , along with a unmarked bell 420? hovering in the trees near my house about 100'. the unmarked helo had no markings except a stripe coming down the engine cowl angled towards the cockpit.
content.summary: 1: child's toplike battleship grey,2: cylinder w/ "windows" silver

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was taking trash out this evening when he had me come outside as fast as i could. after seeing them, i ran inside to get my camera. we truly do not know what these were, which is why they are called unidentified flying objects, it was exciting, fun and made us extremely curious. we saw them, perhaps 8 to 10 of them at differing times, varried speeds, come from the north west, moving over a tree line. we live near a joint force air base, as they flew over/near the air base, the lights dimmed completely, we could still follow the movement against the backdrop of the sky. once we took our eyes off of it/one, we were unable to find it/one again. but if we observed it as it dimmed its lights and followed it visually as it flew past the base, we were able to see them moving. a neighbor out jogging said he had been following them visually as well but thought they were flares.
a car drove by us and stopped at the stop sign saying he had seen them the past few nights. it is important to note, we did not see the lights come back on after we observed them moving over what would be the base.
there wasn't any noise whatsoever, the motions were smooth, almost gliding. our children came outside as well, our 16 year old daughter describes them as the lit lanterns from the movie rapunzel.
i did capture several images which upon first glance they appear to be the size of tiny dots in the sky. i zoomed in on them on my computer and loved seeing the different shapes in the extreme close-ups but since i am not computer/image savvy, i/we would love to know what you guys think, does the pixels tell you anything, etc.? were there any other reports heard of?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: We honestly do not know what they were. a neighbor mentioned flares but flares do not move the way these did.

content.detailedDescription:
My dad was driving to work (he is a new paper deliver to jasper) the ufo crossed right in front of him in
 the high way, he said it was about 10 feet off the ground, he said it was a size of a house. but he didn't 
really see the object since it just looked like a blinding ball of light. he stopped in the middle of the road 
and took his camera out (he carry's it with him so when he goes to jasper he can take pictures of the wildlife) 
he started to film the ufo, but then he realized he had to pull over to the start of the road, for safety reasons. 
witch was the nothing but black part of the video. he stepped out ans started to film it. someone say him standing 
out with the camera, he soon pulled over and started to watch with him, then more and more people stopped. the ufo 
seemed to dart all over the sky coming closer then far away, it had to lights they would change colour every so 
often, between red, blue and green. the clolurs blinded into each other, but when it was on it side you could 
clearly see there was two lights. at some point of the video you could see faintly another one following it, my 
father said he never saw it until he look at the video. my dad got 4:43 mins of it, he had to leave to go do 
his job. the video camera is a little old so the video looks a little fuzzy, and it couldn't focus on the ufo 
since it moved to quickly. my dads friend neal, once said saw something like this when he was child a long time 
ago, he said his father woke him up to go see it and he described the ufo, that sound quite like we saw. he said 
it stayed around for about half an hour, then quickly darted off. 

i also saw a ufo once it was around 5:00am, sadly i don't remember what the date was but i do know it was in 2012.
 when i had just started school. i was in my bed room, i happened in glance out of the window (it's very rare for 
me, since i tend to shin the sun like a goth) this one had 6 with lights witch where in circle, it was big about 
the size of a golf ball. witch i guess pretty big for being in the sky, but i saw nothing else the rest of it 
seem to match the sky. i was looking out my window when all of a sudden it appeared, seemly out of the blue then 
zoomed out way faster than any plane i've seen, and i never saw it again.
content.summary: Cricle object with, red gren blue lights

content.detailedDescription: Driving home on i-80 going west.  asked my mom what the red-orange lights were to the north.  she said, "well, i think those are the lights that are on telephone lines."  i said, "no, they are moving."  turned off on tiffin, iowa exit to watch.  tried to videotape with my mom's phone, but cannot make out the shapes as there was too much light and distance for camera to capture.  there were approximately 12 ufos.  amazing!
content.summary: Hovering -orange lights off of interstate at tiffin, iowa. saw with my mom. formed a pattern, pulsating, then disinegrated.

content.detailedDescription: I just glanced out the widow.. i saw a round glowing ball.. slowly fade away.. so i looked it up.. i also found someone in iowa that saw the same thing at the same time! i just had to tell you about this..
content.summary: A glowing ball that slowly went away..

content.detailedDescription: Green glowing form appeared on photos. did not notice the object until i looked at pictures.
content.summary: Green object noticed in sunset photos. took 15 photos and green object appears in four sequential shots.

content.detailedDescription:
For the past few nights and still ongoing, everytime i go to walk my dog i have seen a ufo. 

this is very strange in my back yard i have strange acting lighting bugs,(they seem to flicker many times) not the ordinary one pulse then a pause then another pulse. they seem to act up when i come outside.  i have not seen type like these bugs anywhere in the neighborhood, only in my yard. shortly after seeing this event a ufo will appear above, but recently this sphere lowered down dimly light and change direction toward me when i became nervous 
about the encounter and i moved across the street.  i have such confidence that every time these lightning bugs act up, i will always see up to several spheres above. has such a thing happened like this? i will record this on digital and submit tomorrow.
content.summary: For the past few nights and still ongoing, everytime i go to walk my dog i have seen a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were outside by our pool and noticed this bright ball of light that seem to be traveling at a high rate of speed. we noticed that it was a continuous light. there were airplanes at roughly the same elevation that had their blinking red lights on, this had no blinking lights. it flew very fast from a south west direction in a straight line to the north east. when it flew overhead, there was no jet sound like most make when they pass. i have never witnessed a "ufo" before. all i know is the characteristics where not the same as jets that fly over at night. it had a high altitude, it did not pulsate or move abruptly in any direction, it stayed on a very straight continuous flight path until we could not see it any longer when it went behind some clouds by the moon. we tried to take video with our cell phone, however it was at such a high altitude at night, it did not show up. i would not report this if i thought it was an airplane or jet.
content.summary: Very bright ball of light traveling at a high speed, no blinking lights like airplanes in the area about the same elevation.

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were watching fireworks.. looking towards mt wachusett the blinking red light from walmart moutain. when to the left of the light a bright orange glow starting coming up i thought it must be a plane but when the light hit the clouds it slowly disappeared and never flew over.. then i looked back again another one had started to take the same path but this one was a copper color and it took the same path again and did the samething.. then while the fireworks were going off a very deep red light moved from the moutain again went probably a 100 feets up and moved towards another hill or mountain in the distance and desended below tree line at a fast pace very random stuff..
content.summary: Very strange i know the flight patterns in my area

content.detailedDescription: Sitting at campfire at camp. supermoon event had us looking at the sky more than normal this weekend. first thought it was a big fireball shooting star. bowie shaped fireball in east sky traveling very slowly northbound. changed shape to circular and changed direction traveling east away from us and disappeared in the distance. felt bewildered, not knowing what to think.
content.summary: Odd shape changing direction changing fireball

content.detailedDescription: Was outside enjoying a warm summer evening.  sitting in the back yard facing the east.  an odd yellowish light caught my eye as it moved quickly off to the northeast.  odd in the that color was that of  a "camp fire" only brighter.  not the red, green or white lights of an aircraft.  i looked directly overhead and saw 2 more, one behind the other, following the same path as the first.  i looked to the southwest and saw 2 more approaching the tree tops from that direction.  i ran in the house to get my binoculars, which took maybe 30 seconds.  upon my return, those 2 were overhead with 2 more approaching from the southwest again.  they passed directly overhead without a sound.  through the binoculars they appeared to be round and flame like, traveling in a straight line from the southwest to the northeast until they were out of sight.  the whole event lasted maybe 2-3 minutes.
content.summary: 7 flaming orbs flying in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: Driving north on rt 65 south of lima,had just entered the city limits when i observed a very bright object, pulsating red and orange with a lot of intensity.It was bright enough to leave an image in my vision when i looked back to check for traffic.I was still driving at this time. the object ascended a few degrees and then while descending made a fairly sharp 90 degree turn to the east. at this point the shape of the object appeared to change, it became much less sphere like. again the intensity of the light made it to discern a shape it then started a slow ascent in a northeasterly direction. at this point i was finally to park my car. i got to listen for any engine noise. i heard none, but was a lot farther away than i would have liked. object then ascended at a fairly steep angle (75 degrees) until it became to small to see. the smoothness of the flight was remarkable. it looked like cgi. something else, there was a red light flashing on top. almost like and aircraft marker lights, but the brilliance of the object made the red light hard to see.
content.summary: Red/orange or

content.detailedDescription: I was hanging laundry on the line in the backyard when i looked up at the clouds. we live in the desert, clouds mean some kind of weather. looking above the line, i saw a bright light in the distance-north to where i am located. it was far off but i watched it and it simply moved a little downward like it was descending. i turned my head to tell my daughter to come outside and when i turned around again, it was gone. less than say, 3 minutes later, still hanging laundry, i saw another ball of light (maybe the same) this one also north but closer than the last one. still too far to make out a shape other than a "ball of light" that i can think of. it slowly pulsated its white light, even through the cloud cover. it then looked like it was heading towards the ground. it broke from my site. an airliner passed overhead not a minute or so later and even though that was also way off in the distance it was obvious that it was an airplane.
content.summary: Small ball of light way in the distance while i was hanging laundry. saw it two times, may have been the same one.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking along the beach around 10:00pm the evening of june 21,2013. there was a full moon that night which was a majestic sight over the ocean. i heard a group of people yelling and pointing at the sky. i looked up over the ocean and saw 3 glowing lights in a line. the light farthest to the right went out and was replaced by another to the front left of the line. this happened about 3 times. there was no sound. i was trying to find the video button on my phone and captured the last few seconds of the light show and then they disappeared. my husband and i have seen strange lights on this beach before and told others on the island. some look at you crazy and some told us they were flares. these were not flares. the ocean was very visible and there were no boats under or near these lights.The group of people who witnessed this with me were very excited and screaming "omg, wow, ufo!"
content.summary: Light show over the ocean surprises beach visitors

content.detailedDescription: I was camping at the lake (there were several people there but i was apparently the only person who saw this, which is very frustrating, but everyone else was doing something). i was sitting in my chair looking at the sky because the moon was so big that night and i was just taking in the scenery. the object appeared out of nowhere below the moon level but quite a bit above the treetops across the cove. it made no sound. it glowed with a greenish light and looked slightly flattened like a sideways oval. it made a whitish halo around it which could have been from the clouds. it moved from east to west for a few seconds and then disappeared again as suddenly as it appeared. it moved level. it was not falling like a meteor, it did not have a tail. i have seen many meteors or "falling stars" over the years and this looked nothing like that. this moved much too slowly and it was too big. i saw it, watched it for only a second and realized it was just weird so i opened my mouth to say "hey! look at that!" to my husband who was trying to start a campfire and had his back to what i was seeing, and before i could get the words out the object was gone. all i could say was "please tell me somebody else saw that..." no one else did. i'd say that if i hadn't been looking at the sky when it happened, i probably wouldn't have seen it either. i stayed up late that night scanning the sky because i was hoping it would happen again so i could point it out- if other people could see it too then i'd know i wasn't nuts. it didn't happen again. as soon as we got home i started googling "green meteor no tail" and found this site. i just hope someone else out there saw what i saw. i had no idea what it was when i first saw it and i still don't. i don't know what to think because i've always been a bit of a skeptic about this kind of thing. i feel a little strange about submitting this report but i have to do something because it's been two days since it happened and i'm still a little shaken up.
content.summary: Green slightly flattened object appeared, moved east to west for about three seconds and then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was working on a house at newtonlongville and had coffee and smoke at bottom of garden as it looked out to open fields when from my right i saw movement it was silver in colour  disc shape top half had port holes no sound watching this object flying about 20-40ft off the ground about 30-50ft  long 20-30ft high and about 300-500ft away   could not believe what i was seeing and not having a camera on me i ran in house to find someone or something to witness the object that was flying across the fields but to no avail 
this what i saw and i have only started to tell about it this year as it was in 1991-1992 oct -nov 12-16th ,the reason at time for not reporting it was who was going to believe me as had no proof.
i am now 49 and would like to put it on record  ( seeing is believing )
now that communication is a lot better and phones have cameras are at hand to catch these ufos to show they are real .
content.summary: Disc shape 30-50ft long 20-30ft wide silver top half had port holes no sound

content.detailedDescription: The details are a little fuzzy and memory faded, but when i was seven yrs old living in mabelvale arkansas with dad and mom, i was asleep and then woke up to see a strange round light outside moving around behind the trees in the back of the property. the light was a soft white color and moved left to right and then dropped down and rose up again and vanished. i was scared and ran across the hall into my older sister's room for comfort. the next day i noticed a scab on the left side of my lower back.  scar remains there after all these years, it is about 10 mm in size. i have only seen the scar in a mirror since i can't directly view this area of my back. i have no idea if this mark on my back has anything to do with the light i saw.
content.summary: I was seven yrs old, through my bedroom i window saw a round light outside, moving left, right, down and up behind the trees. it was about midnight.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 10:35 or 10:40pm est in north mississauga, ontario was reading in bed and noticed between the california blind slats a large orange light. at first i thought it was a flare. i rushed to the window. i tried to take pictures, but my digital camera could not focus and was getting the screen and was not working. i did then run out and tell my wife...Jumped on our wooden deck and watched the last object trail behind the formation. i think the event, when i checked my watch officially ended at 10:45pm or so. below is what i wrote minutes after the event:

"....A few min ago i spotted 4 lantern like objects from my bedroom window - orange glow moving slowly and silently from n to nw direction. low on the horizon in a staggered formation...If anyone else has seen this let me know...Squarish lantern-like object with steady fire-orange light - no flash or strobe...."

the day after i contacted yyz airport operations - lester b pearson. it was their first call of this nature according to the help desk (airport ops). i asked if i could get any radar confirmation of aircraft giving off a locator beacon flying in the milton / n. mississauga between 10:40 and 10:45pm june 21st. the person said that he would ask the "tower" to see if that information was available. if the radar saw objects but no locator beacon i thought we would have some kind of confirmation.

i said the lights (lantern-like objects) moved in formation, silently northward and across what seemed to be from my perspective four or five house-tops - then turned into the clouds and disappeared in the northwest direction. when they turned there was no change in lighting...Again..The fire red lantern-type illumination persisted. no fade, or change in light or exhaust indication. there was an ever-so-slight greyish out-line that made it look square and hence the lantern reference.  the objects just moved in what appeared to be a northwest  direction into the clouds - but its lighting characteristics did not change - it remained orange-red until it was covered by cloud.

i have lived outside the yyz west-bound air-path for 12 years and know the local air traffic well. this was like nothing i had ever seen - nor could explain. if a regular jet line was a single dimension in size (white head-lights, flashing lights etc upon approach) this orange light was 4 to 5 times that size. it was just above the house-tops - so a 45 degree angle. distance and speed hard to tell, but it moved across my horizon - perhaps 6 house tops within a few minutes - under 5000 ft moving at a few hundred miles an hour?  what made it stand out - it was large, flew in formation, silent and brighter than a jet-liner, lantern-like. it think it would be pretty-well impossible for anyone standing in the back-yard looking up to have not seen these lights. i don't know if it was some summer solstice festivel or a special terrestrial craft. i'd like to have a corroborating sighting or news from yyz radar. again, it would be impossible for radar not to seen these objects if they were airborne vehicles.
content.summary: Orange red - lantern-like objects flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front deck at 9:30 pm.  i was looking at the full moon when i saw a star that was moving to the right, then it started getting closer to where i was.  i then realized it wasn't a star.  i was mesmerized and watched it keep getting closer, then suddenly it went to the right of my house and disappeared.
content.summary: First thought it was a bright star, then it started coming towards me and got real close. then it went south and looked like it evaporated.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of june 22, 2013 at approximately 11pm, while observing the super moon, my wife & i noticed 9 reddish-orange orbs flying east at high-speed over north lethbridge, alberta. theses were not flares, airplanes or helicopters. the objects made no sound and were in scattered formation (altitudes ranged from the lowest orb flying approx. 20,000 to the highest being approx. 40,000 feet)for about two minutes until forming a triangle formation pattern and then disappearing straight up into the stars. the whole event lasted about 3 minutes.
content.summary: 9 reddish-orange orbs flying high-speed over north lethbridge, alberta and heading east

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my back yard sky watching as i do every night. i often see things that could be satellites or ufo's. but this time it was much closer or larger and brighter than any i have ever seen. brighter than aircraft landing lights that are usually in the area. when it got over me straight up i observed it with my binoculars to be sure it was not a plane. it was a bright blue-ish white slightly pulsating. as it moved it seemed to be on a jittery path, changing speed and direction kind of like a jitterbug on the water. after it passed overhead and was far to the southeast it quickly turned red-orange and got smaller and dimmer until it was out of sight. at that time the full moon was low and a bit to the north and blocked by the house next door so it did not interfere with my observation.
as the object was overhead i felt energy, a kind of excitement not usually felt during my other nightly observations.
content.summary: Bright star like object went directly overhead then changed to orange-red and shot off disappearing in the se sky.
